Name: 2_obamacare_healthcare_insurance_insurers

['For-profit health insurance and their CEOs like Brian Thompson is the major reason why Americans don‚Äôt have affordable universal healthcare.', "Murdered health insurance boss backed 'AI that denied 90% of coverage:
